setAppointment(Appointment) - Method in class Controllers.ModifyAppointmentController
setAppointment first gets the dates and times from the selected appointment, it then parses that date time to extract the time in string format, and it sets the start and end time combo boxes with those values.
setBusinessTime(String) - Static method in class Models.UserLocalTime
sets the business's time zone, ET in this program
setCountryComboBox() - Method in class Controllers.AddCustomerController
setCountryComboBox is run when the AddCustomer view is visited.
setCountryComboBox() - Method in class Controllers.ModifyCustomerController
Sets the country combo box with all available countries after running a SQL Select statment
setCustomer(Customer) - Method in class Controllers.ModifyCustomerController
Sets the customer fields in the modify view
setDivisionComboBox(int) - Method in class Controllers.AddCustomerController
setDivisionComboBox is called whenever a country is selected from the country combo box.
setDivisionComboBox(int) - Method in class Controllers.ModifyCustomerController
The division combo box is set when this method is called, which is each time a new country is selected in the country combo box.
setPreparedStatement(Connection, String) - Static method in class Database.DBPreparedStatement
The setPreparedStatement method takes in the connection and the sql statement to create a prepared statement with a valid connection to the DB.
setUserName(String) - Static method in class Models.User
Sets the static username
setUserName(String) - Static method in class Models.UserLocalTime
sets the user's timezone
start(Stage) - Method in class main.HelloApplication
start sets global variables for the user's local timezone as well as ET time zone.
startConnection() - Static method in class Database.DBConnection
start connection opens a connection with the MySQL DB and allows for queries and insert statements to be performed
